post:
HostRound LLC is a is a US-based hosting company its founders have a passion to provide better hosting solutions and the level of support that you deserve.


Cloud Servers is the latest addition to our product lineup, offering an excellent alternative for anyone that needs a light, moderate or even intensive traffic solution with powerful computing and full data protection.
Cloud Server is the best affordable solution for a fully controlled and powerful hosting environment.



Why HostRound Cloud Servers?

- Intel Skylake CPUs
- Pure SSD storage (20x I/O speed)
- High-availability servers (100% Uptime)
- 24/7 Premium Support
- DDoS Protection
- Full Server Management (cPanel Only)
- Full root Access
- Wide range of Operating Systems (Linux & Windows)
- Pre-installed Apps (WordPress, Drupal, Docker, Prestashop and more)
- All incoming bandwidth is free on every cloud server
- Tier-III Datacenters
- Full-featured, Easy and Elegant cloud management panel.
- Upload Custom ISO from URL
- Snapshots and Automated Backup
- A wide range of add-ons available to your cloud server




Our prices are already discounted, but you can get an extra discount if you order before October 1st.
Get 10% extra discount on any plan
Use coupon CLOUD10FORLIFE
